text: Eva Kelly Bowring (January 9, 1892 â€” January 8, 1985) was a United States Senator from Nebraska. She was the first woman from Nebraska in the Senate. She was a Senator for seven months during 1954. She was born in Missouri. She died the day before her 93rd birthday. title: Eva Bowring
